description: Accounting and status information corresponding to a voting pool outBailment consensus round
title: Withdrawal status list

___roundID.description: A positive integer representing the consensus round for which the withdrawal is associated

___index.description: Output index in transaction which satisfies this outBailmentID

___amount.description: Monetary value of the output denoted by (ntxid,index), in fundamental units

___ntxid.description: Normalized transaction id associated with the withdrawal

$eref.description: A UUID which selects a specific outBailment for tracking purposes
$eref.title: outBailment Identifier

___pool.description: The voting pool identifier for the pool in which the outBailment originated

___server.description: The OT server nym for the notary which issued the transaction number

___transaction.description: The OT transaction number associated with the outBailment

___outBailmentID.description: the identifier of the originating nym's outBailment message

$eref.description: A unique identifier for a specific address in a voting pool
$eref.title: Address identifier

___series.description: the series identifier containing the address

___branch.description: the chain within the series containing the desired address

___index.description: the value used to derive the public keys used to create the multisig script

___nextinputstart.description: The inputstart value to be used in the next consensus round as an address identifier

___fees.description: Total transaction fees incurred by the transactions in this round

$eref.description: A unique identifier for a specific address in a voting pool
$eref.title: Address identifier

___series.description: the series identifier containing the address

___branch.description: the chain within the series containing the desired address

___index.description: the value used to derive the public keys used to create the multisig script

___nextchangestart.description: The changestart value to be used in the next consensus round as an address identifier
